title: Hand Detection ML Pipeline
subtitle: Real-time computer vision model for precise hand detection and classification
description: A sophisticated computer vision pipeline that detects and classifies hands in real-time using YOLO architecture. The model distinguishes between hands, arms, and background with 96% accuracy, making it suitable for gesture recognition applications, accessibility tools, and human-computer interaction systems.
problem: Accurate hand detection is crucial for gesture recognition systems, but existing solutions often struggle with distinguishing hands from arms and handling diverse lighting conditions.
solution: Built a custom YOLO-based model trained on 1,740 manually annotated images with strategic data collection across diverse conditions.

key_features: Comprehensive training pipeline with data collection tools
Next.js component library for easy integration
Automated model versioning and experiment tracking

technical_challenges.solution: Implemented strategic data collection across diverse lighting conditions, hand positions, and backgrounds. Created balanced dataset with equal representation across all classes.
technical_challenges.impact: Prevented overfitting and improved model generalization

technical_challenges.solution: Optimized YOLO model architecture, implemented efficient preprocessing pipeline, and fine-tuned inference parameters.
technical_challenges.impact: Achieved 30+ FPS performance suitable for real-time applications

technical_challenges.solution: Developed sophisticated labeling strategy and data augmentation techniques to clearly distinguish between hands and arms.
technical_challenges.impact: Reduced false positives by 40% and improved gesture recognition accuracy

technical_challenges.solution: Created automated deployment pipeline to HuggingFace with comprehensive documentation and integration examples.
technical_challenges.impact: Seamless model access via simple URL-based loading

api.response_format: JSON with bounding boxes and confidence scores

data_collection.diversity: Multiple skin tones and hand sizes
